name: Acrobatic
description: You have excellent body awareness and coordination.

name: Agile
description: You are particularly flexible and poised.

name: Alertness
description: You have finely tuned senses.

name: Animal Affinity
description: You are good with animals.

name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
benefits: No penalty for wearing heavy armor
description: You are proficient with heavy armor.

name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
benefits: No penalty for wearing light armor
description: You are proficient with light armor.

name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
benefits: No penalty for wearing medium armor
description: You are proficient with medium armor.

name: Athletic
description: You have a knack for athletic endeavors.

name: Augment Summoning
benefits: Summoned creatures gain +4 Str and Con
description: Your summoned creatures are more powerful than normal.

name: Blind-Fight
benefits: No loss of Dex to AC against invisible attackers
Half speed penalty when moving in darkness
description: You know how to fight in melee without being able to see your foes.

name: Brew Potion
description: You can create magic potions.

name: Cleave
description: You can follow through with powerful blows.

name: Combat Casting
benefits: +4 bonus on Concentration checks for defensive casting
description: You are adept at casting spells in combat.

name: Combat Expertise
benefits: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus
description: You are trained at using your combat skill for defense.

name: Combat Reflexes
benefits: Additional attacks of opportunity equal to Dex modifier
description: You can respond quickly and repeatedly to opponents who drop their guard.

name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor
benefits: Can create magic weapons, armor, and shields
description: You can create magic weapons, armor, and shields.

name: Craft Rod
description: You can create magic rods.

name: Craft Staff
description: You can create magic staffs.

name: Craft Wand
description: You can create magic wands.

name: Craft Wondrous Item
description: You can create magic wondrous items.

name: Deceitful
description: You have a talent for misleading others.

name: Deft Hands
description: You have exceptional manual dexterity.

name: Diligent
description: You are thorough and pay attention to detail.

name: Dodge
benefits: +1 dodge bonus to AC against one opponent
description: You are adept at dodging blows.

name: Empower Spell
description: You can cast spells to greater effect.

name: Endurance
benefits: +4 bonus on checks for extended activity
description: You have exceptional endurance.

name: Enlarge Spell
description: You can cast spells farther than normal.

name: Eschew Materials
benefits: Cast spells without material components up to 1 gp
description: You can cast spells without relying on material components.

name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
benefits: No penalty with chosen exotic weapon
description: You understand how to use an exotic weapon in combat.

name: Extend Spell
description: You can make your spells last twice as long.

name: Extra Turning
prerequisites: Ability to turn or rebuke undead
benefits: Turn or rebuke undead 4 more times per day
description: You can turn or rebuke undead more often than normal.

name: Far Shot
benefits: Increase range increment by 50% for ranged weapons
description: You can get greater distance out of ranged weapons.

name: Forge Ring
description: You can create magic rings.

name: Great Cleave
benefits: No limit on cleave attacks per round
description: You can strike many nearby foes with a single mighty swing.

name: Great Fortitude
description: You are tougher than normal.

name: Greater Spell Focus
benefits: +1 bonus to save DC of chosen spell school (stacks with Spell Focus)
description: Your spells of a particular school are even more potent than normal.

name: Greater Spell Penetration
benefits: +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance (stacks)
description: Your spells break through spell resistance much more easily.

name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting
benefits: Third attack with off-hand weapon at -10
description: You are a master at fighting two-handed.

name: Greater Weapon Focus
benefits: +1 bonus on attack rolls (stacks with Weapon Focus)
description: You have mastered a single weapon.

name: Greater Weapon Specialization
benefits: +2 bonus on damage rolls (stacks with Weapon Specialization)
description: You deal especially deadly blows with your favored weapon.

name: Heighten Spell
description: You can cast a spell as if it were a higher-level spell.

name: Improved Bull Rush
benefits: No attack of opportunity when bull rushing
description: You know how to push opponents back.

name: Improved Counterspell
benefits: Counterspell with spells of same school one level higher
description: You understand the nuances of magic to such an extent that you can counter your opponents' spells with great efficiency.

name: Improved Critical
benefits: Double critical threat range of chosen weapon
description: You know how to hit where it hurts.

name: Improved Disarm
benefits: No attack of opportunity when disarming
description: You know how to disarm opponents in melee combat.

name: Improved Feint
description: You are skilled at misdirecting your opponent's attention in melee.

name: Improved Grapple
benefits: No attack of opportunity when grappling
description: You are skilled at grappling opponents.

name: Improved Initiative
description: You can react more quickly than normal in a fight.

name: Improved Overrun
benefits: No attack of opportunity when overrunning
description: You are skilled at knocking down opponents.

name: Improved Precise Shot
benefits: No penalty for shooting into melee
description: Your aim is so precise that you can shoot an arrow or bolt at an opponent engaged in melee.

name: Improved Shield Bash
benefits: Retain shield AC when shield bashing
description: You can bash with a shield while retaining its defensive bonus.

name: Improved Sunder
benefits: No attack of opportunity when sundering
description: You are skilled at attacking your opponents' weapons and armor.

name: Improved Trip
benefits: No attack of opportunity when tripping
description: You know how to trip opponents in melee combat.

name: Improved Turning
prerequisites: Ability to turn or rebuke undead
benefits: Turn or rebuke undead as if 1 level higher
description: Your turning or rebuking attempts are more powerful than normal.

name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting
benefits: Second attack with off-hand weapon at -5
description: You are an expert in fighting two-handed.

name: Improved Unarmed Strike
benefits: Unarmed attacks don't provoke attacks of opportunity
description: You are skilled at fighting while unarmed.

name: Investigator
description: You have a knack for finding information.

name: Iron Will
description: You have a stronger will than normal.

name: Leadership
description: You are a leader of men.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: You have faster reflexes than normal.

name: Magical Aptitude
description: You have a knack for magical endeavors.

name: Manyshot
description: You can fire multiple arrows simultaneously against a nearby target.

name: Martial Weapon Proficiency
benefits: No penalty with chosen martial weapon
description: You understand how to use a martial weapon in combat.
special: Must choose specific martial weapon or group

name: Maximize Spell
description: You can cast spells to maximum effect.

name: Mobility
benefits: +4 AC against attacks of opportunity from movement
description: You are skilled at dodging past opponents and avoiding blows.

name: Mounted Archery
benefits: Half penalty for ranged attacks while mounted
description: You are skilled at making ranged attacks while mounted.

name: Mounted Combat
benefits: Negate attack against mount once per round
description: You are skilled in mounted combat.

name: Natural Spell
benefits: Cast spells while in wild shape
description: You can cast spells while in a wild shape.

name: Negotiator
description: You are good at gauging and swaying attitudes.

name: Nimble Fingers
description: You are adept at manipulation and misdirection.

name: Persuasive
description: You have a way with words and body language.

name: Point Blank Shot
benefits: +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons within 30 feet
description: You are skilled at making well-placed shots with ranged weapons at close range.

name: Power Attack
benefits: Trade attack bonus for damage bonus
description: You can make exceptionally deadly melee attacks by sacrificing accuracy for strength.

name: Precise Shot
benefits: No -4 penalty for shooting into melee
description: You can shoot or throw ranged weapons at an opponent engaged in melee without penalty.

name: Quick Draw
description: You can draw weapons with startling speed.

name: Quicken Spell
description: You can cast spells with a moment's thought.

name: Rapid Reload
description: Choose a type of crossbow. You can reload that type of crossbow quickly.

name: Rapid Shot
benefits: One extra ranged attack per round at -2 to all attacks
description: You can use ranged weapons with exceptional speed.

name: Ride-By Attack
benefits: Move before and after mounted charge attack
description: You are skilled at fast mounted attacks.

name: Run
description: You are fleet of foot.

name: Scribe Scroll
description: You can create scrolls from known spells.

name: Self-Sufficient
description: You can take care of yourself in harsh environments and situations.

name: Shield Proficiency
description: You are proficient with bucklers, small shields, and large shields.

name: Shot on the Run
benefits: Move before and after ranged attack
description: You are highly trained in skirmish ranged attack tactics.

name: Silent Spell
description: You can cast spells silently.

name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
benefits: No penalty for using simple weapons
description: You understand how to use simple weapons in combat.

name: Skill Focus
description: You are particularly adept at a certain skill.

name: Spell Focus
benefits: +1 bonus to save DC of chosen spell school
description: Your spells of a particular school are more potent than normal.

name: Spell Mastery
description: You have mastered certain spells and can prepare them from memory.

name: Spell Penetration
benefits: +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance
description: Your spells break through spell resistance better than most.

name: Spirited Charge
benefits: Double damage on mounted charge with melee weapon
description: You are trained at making devastating mounted charges.

name: Spring Attack
benefits: Move before and after melee attack without provoking attacks of opportunity
description: You are trained in fast melee attacks.

name: Stealthy
description: You are particularly good at avoiding notice.

name: Still Spell
description: You can cast spells without gestures.

name: Stunning Fist
description: You know how to strike opponents in vulnerable areas.

name: Toughness
description: You are tougher than normal.

name: Tower Shield Proficiency
benefits: No penalty for using tower shields
description: You are proficient with tower shields.

name: Track
description: You can follow the trails of creatures and characters across most types of terrain.

name: Trample
description: You are skilled at running down opponents with your mount.

name: Two-Weapon Defense
benefits: +1 shield bonus to AC when fighting with two weapons
description: You are skilled at defending yourself while dual-wielding.

name: Two-Weapon Fighting
benefits: Reduced penalties for fighting with two weapons
description: You can fight with a weapon in each hand.

name: Weapon Finesse
benefits: Use Dex instead of Str for attack rolls with light weapons
description: You are skilled at using your agility in melee combat, as opposed to brute strength.

name: Weapon Focus
benefits: +1 bonus on attack rolls with selected weapon
description: You are especially good at using a selected weapon.

name: Weapon Specialization
benefits: +2 bonus on damage rolls with selected weapon
description: You deal extra damage when using your favored weapon.

name: Whirlwind Attack
description: You can strike out at every foe within reach.

name: Widen Spell
description: You can cast spells that affect a larger area than normal.
